JobFullDesc:
The Team:
Our Sales Development team works with a best-of-breed product that solves real problems for our customers. Sales Development Representatives (SDR) follow a well-defined methodology that helps them identify the customer's unique needs and clearly convey the value of the Datadog product. Whether you're looking to learn from the best or be the best, the Datadog team is dedicated to furthering personal development and team success.
 
The Opportunity: 
We're growing our Sales Development team to amplify our scale across APAC and help IT and Technology leaders recognize Datadog’s impact in their digital transformation and migration to the cloud. We’re searching for a Director of Sales Development who will be responsible for the success of our APAC SDR program, which includes teams based in Singapore, Sydney, Tokyo and Seoul. Direct reports will be Sales Development Managers, who are each responsible for hiring, training and delivering results within their own teams of ~8 SDRs.
This role will impact one of the largest lines of business in the company through lead generation and sales pipeline volume, as well as helping to mold and foster the next future AE's and leaders in our sales org.  
 
You Will: 

Hire, onboard and manage Sales Development Managers based in Singapore, Sydney, Tokyo and Seoul
Participate in the hiring and interviewing process for SDRs across APAC
Motivate managers and their teams to exceed objectives through coaching, regular broadcast of results, and creative incentives
Strategize on hiring plans and regional coverage by working closely with Sales, Recruiting and HR business partners
Work closely with our Enablement team on the training curriculum to maximize SDR skill set and readiness for promotion to Account Executive
Collaborate with Marketing on campaigns and regional efforts to develop pipeline
Maintain accurate reporting and forecasts for senior leadership team

 
You Are: 

Experienced in 3+ years of leadership in Sales or Sales Development
Familiar with Sales Development process and/or pipeline generating strategies
Motivated by helping people grow
Passionate about coaching, mentorship and team management
Able to manage and work across multiple departments
Outstanding at communication, organizational and time management skills
A self-starter with the ability to work in a high-growth, rapidly changing marketplace

 
Bonus Points:

Passionate about tech and the cloud space 
Experience with SaaS/Cloud and Salesforce 

 
Why You Should Apply:

Continuous career development and pathing opportunities 
Training in MEDDIC and Command of the Message
Product training to develop an in-depth understanding of our product and space
Best in breed onboarding
Internal mentor and buddy program cross-departmentally
New hire stock equity (RSUs) and employee stock purchase plan
Generous and competitive global and US benefits
Friendly and inclusive workplace culture

 
About Datadog:
Datadog is the monitoring and security platform for cloud applications. Our SaaS product is used by organizations of all sizes across a wide range of industries to enable digital transformation, cloud migration, and infrastructure monitoring of our customers’ entire technology stack, allowing for seamless collaboration and problem-solving among Dev, Ops and Security teams globally. Given the resilience of cloud technologies and importance placed today in digital operations and agility, Datadog continues to innovate and is well positioned for the long term. 
Equal Opportunity at Datadog:
Datadog is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer and is proud to offer equal employment opportunity to everyone regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, veteran status, and more.
